category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECopyIdInContextToAssignedLine
preference.preference_description: Determines if the in-context ID is copied to the assigned line during an assignment operation. When this preference is set to True, you do not have to expand a target structure before performing an accountability check or when using the Find in Other Panel menu command. Valid Values: True - The in-context ID is copied to the assigned line during an assignment operation. If no in-context ID is present, Teamcenter creates one and then copies it. False - The in-context ID is not copied (even if one is present) to the assigned line during an assignment operation.
